channel.title: CVE Feed for ZoneMinder -- all

item.title: CVE-2023-25825|2023-02-25T00:44:25.132Z -- zoneminder -- zoneminder
item.description: ZoneMinder is a free, open source Closed-circuit television software application for Linux which supports IP, USB and Analog cameras. Versions prior to 1.36.33 are vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting. Log entries can be injected into the database logs, containing a malicious referrer field. This is unescaped when viewing the logs in the web ui. This issue is patched in version 1.36.33.
